sentence.Network_en: But Mitchell aside, saying he was not a statistician.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是米切尔置之不理, 并说他不是统计学家.

sentence.Network_en: A statistician has to be something of a generalist.
Sarah used to teach psychology, but now she is a corporate statistician.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨拉过去教过心理学, 不过现在她是一个公司的统计员.

entry.def: A statistician is a person who studies statistics or who works using statistics.

means.word_mean: 1. a mathematician who specializes in statistics
2. someone versed in the collection and interpretation of numerical data (especially someone who uses statistics to calculate insurance premiums)
